SELECT a.EMP_ID,a.RC_NO,a.SwipeCardTime,a.SwipeCardTime2 FROM CSR_SWIPECARDTIME a left join CSR_EMPLOYEE b on a.EMP_ID=b.Id WHERE WorkshopNo = #{WorkshopNo} and Shift = 'D' AND to_char(SwipeCardTime,'yyyy-MM-dd') = to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-MM-dd')

SELECT a.EMP_ID,a.RC_NO,a.SwipeCardTime,a.SwipeCardTime2 FROM CSR_SWIPECARDTIME a left join CSR_EMPLOYEE b on a.EMP_ID=b.Id WHERE WorkshopNo = #{WorkshopNo} and shift = 'N' and to_char(#{SwipeCardTime}-interval '12' hour,'yyyy-MM-dd')= to_char(swipecardtime-interval '12' hour,'yyyy-MM-dd')

SELECT count(*) FROM CSR_SWIPECARDTIME WHERE EMP_ID = #{EMP_ID} and to_char(SwipeCardTime2,'yyyy-MM-dd')= to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-MM-dd') AND swipecardtime2 > #{SwipeCardTime2}-10/24/60
